thread.section_title: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pets Best Pet Health Insurance | petsbest.com
thread.title: Liane
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Liane

author: Liane
title: Liane
text:
I can highly recommend this company.
If you should have a claim they contact you immediately to say they received the claim and then they take only a few days to make the payment. Pets Best was recommended to me by my vet and they have come thru with all my claims.
